page.title: 06 Housing
page.content: The cost of houses varies from year to year but the average price of a house in this area in 1985 is Â£70-80, 000.Each year between one and two hundred houses are sold. the most expensive sale recently was over Â£440,000. The houses that most people are looking for in this area are detached, with four bedrooms,two bathrooms and a double garage,in the price range Â£85-100,000.There are more houses than bungalows,but a semi-detached bungalow would cost Â£50-60,000.Most houses in the area are privately owned but there are a few very small council housing estates.Nearly all houses have good sized gardens.There has not been much development recently,because of the "Green Belt." People choose to live in this area as it is rural yet close to London.
